name: Evolve | Re-generate
description: use a creation as a stepping stone for another creation

name: Admin User CRUD
description: ability for admin to modify users

name: Mobile copy creation URL
description: Add a copy/share affordance on mobile so users can copy a creation's canonical URL for pasting into creation descriptions or comments.

name: Share includes prompt
description: When a creation is generated from a prompt, include that prompt in the shared description/caption so recipients have useful context when the image is shared externally.

name: Create: auto-expand prompt
description: Make the prompt input on the Create page auto-expand its rows as the user types (similar to the comment composer) to improve writing/editing long prompts.

name: Comment reply notifications
description: Notify users when someone replies to their comment (even on someone else's creation) via in-app notifications, so they can return to the thread.

name: Community page: comment activity
description: Evolve the Servers page into a Community page with tabs for Servers and Comments; Comments highlights recent site-wide activity and links to creations with the latest discussion.

name: Feature requests
description: Let users submit feature requests via a lightweight form, store them for review, and acknowledge submission (basic feedback loop).

name: External image sharing
description: Allow sharing a created image with someone who is not a user, likely via a secure share link/token flow similar to invites (view-only by default, with clear revocation/expiration behavior).

name: Onboarding: choose username
description: During signup, require the user to pick a unique username before they can proceed into the app; validate availability, reserve it, and improve the first-run experience.

name: YouTube link transforms
description: Detect YouTube links across the site (descriptions/comments) and transform them consistently (preview/embed) similar to how creation links are transformed today.

name: Servers: creation inputs
description: Allow provider servers to accept existing creations (e.g., images) as inputs to jobs to enable editing workflows, evolution/regeneration, and other creation-to-creation operations.

name: Invite credits
description: Grant starter credits on invite acceptance; record inviter and source.

name: Provider boosts
description: Server-scoped boosts increase provider credit yield with caps, no discovery lift.

name: Invites & redemption
description: Optional invite onboarding via email or shareable token, with stored invite context.
